content.question: The simile in last sentence of the second paragraph (“In his . . . bow”) primarily serves to

choices.label: contrast with the sound of the autoclave
comment on the boy angel’s physique
explain the purpose for the boy angel’s arrow
underscore the sensuality of the boy angel

content.answer: underscore the sensuality of the boy angel

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Identify and explain the function of a simile.
